name: Press Start Again (NES)
description:
This demo was made in 2018, as my entry for a challenge organized on the NESmaker forum, still while learning the ASM language and NESmaker.

The game is a sequel to my "Press Start Game"... This time, small introductions screens, and more weapons... that you can unlock with the money you collected.

The Story

The takes place right after the event of the previous demo... you still needs to find a way to escape from that Alien planet. 

Instructions

You can play Press Start Game on your computer using an emulator such as FCEUX or MESEN.
